summary: Unless Darren can survive New York's largest drug mogul, write a paper on Dante's "Inferno," escape three thugs chasing the wrong guy and sell fifty pills of ecstasy to make his tuition payment, he'll never date the girl of his dreams.
cast: Diora Baird|Kristen Bell|Michael Masini|Rachel Boston|Christopher Boyd|Jeffrey Nicholas Brown|Michael Peña|Corrine Carey|Jane Lynch|Curran Connor|Lou Taylor Pucci|Jake Demaray|Richard Embardo|Maya Hazen|John Hensley|John Marshall Jones|Chris Johnson|John Kapelos|Monica Keena|Stephen Keys|John C. Mann|Michael Mann|Donnell Rawlings|Ken Rothstein|Paul Schackman|Daniel Spink|Steve Swaim|Eddie Kaye Thomas|Nicholas Thomas|Nora Zehetner|Ron Yuan|Anne Bellamy|Jillian Murray|Alyssa Altman|Wil Daniels|Asusena Huezo|Cassie Jaye|John L. Mann Jr.|Ellen M. Mann|Michael Oliveira|Zack Wagoner|Kent Winfrey|Yesenia Yanez
title: Fifty Pills
